title: Have you seen it? Res Lease in Kyle. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Gorgeous, never-lived in brand New Four Bedroom Two Full Baths and One 1/2 bath in Crosswinds community is now available for immediate move in!
Home will come with all new appliances to include Refrigerator, Gas Stove, Micro, Dishwasher.
Master bedroom is down with carpet flooring and hard tile on the rest of the downstairs living.
Gorgeous white cabinetry in the kitchen!
Upstairs include three bedrooms with one full bath and a second lounge or living space.
Home has a beautiful greenbelt view from the back covered patio.
Enjoy the amazing amenities of Crosswinds community-  a gorgeous swimming pool, amenity center, dog park, playscapes, walking trails, tot pool and splash pad.
Take your children to school in the prestigious Pfluger Elementary School!
Easy access to all major shopping in Kyle, Buda and South Austin.
